column1: The Keepers of the Three Rings were those who held the Three Rings of the Elves after their making
column3: 000 years of the Second Age and Third Age Ages.  Originally the three Keepers were Gil-galad
column5: and Círdan.  Gil-galad gave his Ring to Elrond and Círdan gave his to Gandalf.  At the end of the Third Age
column6: when the Rings of Power finally lost their power and were taken into Aman
